mod-links:
**McHorse's mods**
— McLib: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mchorses-mclib/files 
— Metamorph: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/metamorph/files
— Chameleon: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/chameleon-morph/files 
— Aperture: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/aperture/files 
— Emoticons: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/emoticons/files 
— Blockbuster: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/blockbuster/files
— Minema mod: https://github.com/daipenger/minema/releases
bb-academy:
This is **Blockbuster academy**, a playlist of video tutorials that show basics of Blockbuster mod:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLnllO8nnzE-xmqdymsLpxnXTaAbyIVjM
bb-disable-limbs:
This video shows how to **disable limb idle movement** for Blockbuster models: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XiNDzYrrXUU
bb-scenes:
This video shows **how to use Blockbuster scene**: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qDPEjf2TxAc
bb-camera-sync:
This video shows how to **synchronize Aperture's camera editor with Blockbuster's scenes**, and **how to record video**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VfSZs4f7Dx0
body-part:
This video by **Ethobot** shows to **how to use the body part system** of Blockbuster and Emoticons' morphs:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bzhWB4U-nec
bb-gun:
This excerpt of the change log shows **how to use BB gun**:
https://youtu.be/wpfiLTrzTLs?t=175
animated-poses:
This video shows **how to use animated poses**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Zd0Gd4Eryw
bb-model-glow:
This video shows **how to make models emit light**, i.e. glow:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TnOlF8ZaXns
image-morph:
This video shows **how to use image morphs**: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4znzqXSJU2M
minema:
This video explains **what is Minema mod**, and how to **configure it to record video footage**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wBfOn4cmUDw
bb-record-editing:
This video shows how to **edit player recording files**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VQZe44ergjU
multi-skin:
This video shows how to **use multi-skin to configure multi layered skins**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c8Z4AuGshis
emo-morph:
This video shows **all of the options provided** by Emoticons morph:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hb3eCALm_AY
bb-dc:
This video explains what does **Damage control** system does:
https://youtu.be/hpmDiuODqnc
manual-fixture:
This video shows how to use **manual fixture**:
https://youtu.be/2ToSwrFiVOo?t=150
emo-disable-limbs:
This excerpt shows how to **disable limb movement** for Emoticons morphs:
https://youtu.be/Hb3eCALm_AY?t=49
snowstorm:
This video shows how to use **Snowstorm** particle editor to **create custom particle effects**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J1Ub1tbO9gg
custom-emotes:
This video shows how to **create your own custom emotes for Emoticons mod** using Blender 2.79:
https://youtu.be/dhSYT2HEweM
attach-items:
This video shows how to **attach items** to player models, and any morph that has supports body part system:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sN1OlUWj9Xo
bb-mpm:
This video shows **a workaround to be able to use MorePlayerModels mod by Noppes** with Blockbuster actors:
https://youtu.be/hkED02zILU8
max-packet-size:
This excerpt shows **a workaround to the** `exceeding bla bla bla 32767 bytes` when NBT data passed by Blockbuster (structure morph) or Metamorph (heavy morphs) **is too big**, which kicks you out of the game:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=96_VnqywyRY&t=239s
bb-audio-sync:
This video by **Tossler** shows how to **use in-game audio synchronization feature**, which makes it so easier to record dialogue or music scenes:
https://youtu.be/tKIF27JS6b4
model-command:
This video shows **a couple of subcommands of** `/model` **command**, which allow you to do some neat utility operations on skins and models:
https://youtu.be/g6henpAcQC8
keyframe-fixture:
This video shows how to **use Aperture's keyframe fixture**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pYsPd6ferEs
morph-keybinds:
This excerpt shows how to **set keybinds to acquired morphs**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9WbQa0goUQ?t=260
bb-tips:
This playlist features tutorial videos which show **specific Blockbuster features**. You don't have to **know them**, but the more **you learn**, the more **possibilities you have**:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLnllO8nnzE8qjWXQ0i1wDVmzg_m3NZkd
bb-models:
This playlist features tutorial videos **related to loading custom models** into Blockbuster:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLnllO8nnzE93tlU-Wimcc8JChD7qS2kr
structure-morph:
This video shows how to **create Structure morphs**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X55YLSWJVeM
entity-selectors:
This video shows how to use **Metamorph's feature called entity selectors**, which allows to replace mob's appearance with morphs:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9WbQa0goUQ&t=402s
spin:
This excerpt shows how to **setup a spinning animation**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Zd0Gd4Eryw&t=362s
compress:
This excerpt shows how to **compress video MP4 files** using `ffmpeg`: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oYa_Wtd5Wo8&t=142s
bb-eyes:
This video shows how to **create eyes animation**:
https://youtu.be/LTNfH2pUwuI
fight-scene:
This video by **SeanFilmProduction** shows how to do **fight scenes** in Blockbuster: 
https://youtu.be/FzCCg2mJscw
manual-focus:
This video shows an experimental feature that can be used with **manually edited** shader packs and Aperture:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MC3t6GiQMQI
bb-armies:
This video shows how to **setup armies of actors**, i.e. duplicate multiple player recordings and adjust their position and delay of the playback:
https://youtu.be/YMUgMj9wWI4
ap-academy:
This playlist shows **the basics of Aperture mod**:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLnllO8nnzE8MGDb6QzE2kt4-KVC1dRRl
bb-characters:
This tutorial shows how to **import multi-limb bipedal models** into Blockbuster:
https://youtu.be/NNvOdmWsd8I
blockbench:
This video shows how to **import static Blockbench models** with **Chameleon** mod:
https://youtu.be/97romIu2DGo
bb-magicavoxel:
This video shows how to **import MagicaVoxel models** with Blockbuster:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RUcXH6dnpcQ
minema-report:
In order for me to **efficiently** help you **to fix an issue** with **Minema** mod, please provide following:
1. Screenshot of where you installed `ffmpeg`, **entire window** please
2. File `config/minema.cfg` (drag and drop the file into the Discord window, **don't screenshot it**!)

If you haven't installed `ffmpeg` yet, you can download it:
— Windows: https://www.gyan.dev/ffmpeg/builds/ffmpeg-release-full.7z
— Everything else: https://ffmpeg.org/download.html
bb-model-blocks:
This video shows how to **use Blockbuster's model blocks**, special kind of blocks that allow to place morphs as decorations:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PaUue4oax58
bb-morphs:
This video shows how to **setup skins and configure Blockbuster morphs**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=33S4PFVuygc
compatibility:
This page lists the **compatible versions of my mods**, and **incompatible mods and possible fixes for these mods**:
https://github.com/mchorse/mclib/wiki/Compatibility-table-of-McHorse's-mods
bb-record-morph:
This video shows how to use **record morph, which allows to playback a Blockbuster player recording, inside of a morph**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GnkbJ6teY0o
sequencer-morph:
This video by **Ethobot** shows how to **use sequencer morph**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s_gzzzVjJ_k
blockbench-animated:
This video shows how to **import animated Blockbench models** using **Chameleon mod** (make sure you to also watch the **Static Blockbench models** tutorial, see `!blockbench`):
https://youtu.be/CgHWIL6h1XU
eyes-animation:
This video shows how to **use eyes rig** and **setup eyes animation**:
https://youtu.be/vFhErlhTrMA
keying:
This video shows how to **use green screen and keying features of Blockbuster and Minema mods**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OY_USRJofT0
bb-models-materials:
This section of old Blockbench tutorial shows how **to setup multiple OBJ materials**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QdN4C3XFRDI&t=105s
morph-categories:
This excerpt shows how to **add custom user morph categories** (these allow to store morphs across worlds):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9WbQa0goUQ&t=126s
shaders:
This page is a semi-official (or something like that) list of Optifine shader packs:
https://shaders.fandom.com/wiki/Shader_Packs
mtl:
This excerpt from old Blockbench video shows how to **setup materials for OBJ models** that have **several textures**:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QdN4C3XFRDI?t=125
placeholder:
This excerpt of Emoticons’ change log video shows how to **use Emoticons morph’s placeholder option**:

bb-restore:
This excerpt from BB academy (2020) scenes episode shows how to **restore an accidentally overwritten player recording**:
